title: Joy of Logging Out (1 pc.)
long: Ephemeral joy extracted from closing all 27 tabs. Side effects: silence, clarity, mild fear of missing out.

title: Human Connection (Limited Time Offer)
long: Guaranteed eye contact not included. Supply chain issues may delay feelings. Returns not accepted.

title: Algorithmic Approval Sticker Pack
short: Boost your worth with imaginary metrics.
long: Peel-and-stick dopamine. Includes: ‘Recommended For You’, ‘Verified Vibes’, and ‘Mukhang Productive’.

title: Buy Now, Pay Never™
short: A payment plan that postpones consequences.
long: Terms and conditions longer than your lifespan. Interest calculated in existential dread.

title: Offline Air (Laguna Lake, 250ml)
short: A souvenir from outside the feed.
long: Collected during a rare moment of not being perceived. Best before: the next notification.

title: 3AM Doomscroll Insurance
long: Policy includes: 1 glass of water, 3 deep breaths, and permission to sleep. Excludes comment sections.
